alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 06 at 12:33AM CDT until April 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Carlton and South St. Louis County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This is a heavy, wet snow that will stick to trees and powerlines and may cause power outages. Windy conditions will contribute to this threat. Heavy snowfall rates expected through early Wednesday with a lull in the snow early this morning before more comes later today.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
